subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Arjun Atwal of India carded eight birdies and a lone bogey and holds a one-shot lead over Davis Love III and Jim Furyk after the second round of the McGladrey Classic at Sea Island in Georgia.
snippet: Arjun Atwal of India carded eight birdies and a lone bogey and holds a one-shot lead over Davis Love III and Jim Furyk after the second round of the McGladrey Classic at Sea Island in Georgia.
